scripts.say: Apart from Chicago's South Group, the three sisters Astoria, Quincy, and Vincennes were assigned to the Eagle Union's North Fleet.
Astoria, it's so hot...
Okay~ In that case, why don't you take off your blazer and pass it over to me?
It's still too hot even if I take it off... I'm gonna melt...
We're in the tropics, after all. This is just how the climate is all year 'round. At least it cools down at night.
That said, Vincennes has been busy lugging supplies around the last two days, so it only makes sense that she'd be tired...
Also, going on patrol is tiring and boring... Why do we have to run around when Enterprise and the others could handle it?
Um, it seems that the admiralty is worried that there are enemy carriers lurking around, so they issued orders to have her withdrawn...
That's why we're needed to patrol the area and ensure the safety of the landing force.
Quincy knows everything, doesn't she? Is she becoming a better big sister than me?
Th-that wasn't my intention... I just want to be helpful to you, Astoria...
Hm... is that so? But not this time! You've shown me that I need to get smarter! Quincy, after this mission is over, teach me how to get smart!
Um, sure!
Quincy, I'm sleepy...
I suppose there's no helping it... Vincennes, come here, I'll carry you.
Yay! Quincy, I love you~
What about Astoria? You know, your other big sister?!
Um... I love you second best?
Hm... I suppose that's still a silver medal...
Suddenly, all three sisters were illuminated by searchlights.
Searchlights...? Or did someone behind us accidentally turn on the high beams...?
Wait, no! These are... enemies! Quincy, Vincennes, prepare for battle!
